code.title: Model code
code.description: Code of the simulation model to be run

limit.title: Simulation time limit
limit.description: Number of simulation steps to execute

make_static.title: Make inputs static
make_static.description: Make certain inputs static, ie generate them at the beginning of the simulation.

oneOf.description: Make static the inputs with prebooked==True.
Make static the inputs with prebooked==True and don't generate the others.
Make all inputs static for the resolution, then remove prebooked from solution and insert them dynamically.

early_dynamic_input.title: Early dynamic input offset
early_dynamic_input.description: Offset applied to the users origin time to make them enter the simulation earlier, in seconds

seed.title: Random seed
seed.description: Random seed used for the generation of random events

date.title: Simulation date
date.description: Date of the simulation, used for filtering services. Format YYYY-MM-DD

time_log.title: Simulation time log
time_log.description: Boolean indicating if simulation time should be logged

generate_summary.title: Generate run summary
generate_summary.description: Boolean indicating if run summary should be generated.

traces_output.title: Traces output
traces_output.description: Boolean indicating if an agent traces output should be created

geojson_output.title: Geojson output
geojson_output.description: Boolean indicating if a geojson file should be created

geojson_format.title: Geojson filename format
geojson_format.description: Format of the geojson output filename. Formatted with the 'scenario' placeholder.

geojson_version.title: Geojson output version
geojson_version.description: Version of the geojson output format to use. If not provided, the version specified in geojson_output.py is used.

kpi_output.title: KPI output
kpi_output.description: Boolean indicating if a KPI file should be created

kpi_format.title: KPIs filename format
kpi_format.description: Format of the KPI outputs filename. Formatted with the 'scenario' and 'kpi_output' placeholders.

simulate_routes.title: Route steps simulation
simulate_routes.description: Boolean indicating if route steps should be simulated

dynamic_input_file.title: Dynamic input file
dynamic_input_file.description: Name of the file containing the dynamic input

init_input_file.title: Initialisation input file
init_input_file.description: Name of the file containing the initialisation input

additional_properties.description: Array of two string items, the network file and the speeds file

store_paths.title: Store shortest paths
store_paths.description: Indicates if computed shortest paths should be stored in a dict to avoid computing them again. Either a boolean or a dict with the same keys as topologies and boolean values.

gtfs_timetables.title: GTFS timetables archive
gtfs_timetables.description: Name of the archive containing the gtfs timetables, placed in the gtfs_feeds data folder

line_shapes_file.title: Line shapes file
line_shapes_file.description: Name of the file containing shapes of public transport lines

routes.title: Routes to keep in the public transport simulation
routes.description: List of routes that should be present in the simulation. If null, keep all routes.
